    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = -1 + (2*(-1)^n + 5*2^(n+1))/3.",
        "G.f.: (3-x)/((1-x)*(1+x)*(1-2*x)).",
        "a(n) = 3*A000975(n+1) - A000975(n). - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 11 2019",
        "a(n)+a(n+1) = A051633(n+1). - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 23 2023"
    ],
